thread.title: Joanna Palani reveals she is sniper who fights Isis | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Joanna Palani reveals she is sniper who fights Isis | Daily Mail Online

author: Nick Fagge And Lara Whyte In Copenhagen For Mailonline
title: Joanna Palani reveals she is sniper who fights Isis | Daily Mail Online
text: EXCLUSIVE - 'ISIS want to kill me, capture me and turn me into a sex slave': Danish student branded a terrorist after training as 'Lady Death' sniper to fight jihadis in Syria reveals she has lost everything Joanna Palani fled Denmark to fight with Kurdish Peshmerga/YPG against Isis But when she returned to Copenhagen was banned from travel under terror law Now 23-year-old is facing jail for flouting ban introduced to stop Isis fighters Joanna admits to MailOnline she went to fight in Manbijj, Syria AGAIN last year Reveals she spent 'days' as a YPG crack-shot sniper picking off jihadi targets Admits she broke the travel ban but claims she did it to 'protect Europe' Now she has lost her home, her family, is under threat from Isis and facing jail 'I was willing to give up my life and my freedom to stop Isis advancing,' she said Admits being a sniper: 'I use a Russian sniper rifle. You have to be very patient' Published: 07:53 GMT, 7 February 2017 | Updated: 09:41 GMT, 7 February 2017 349 shares
